caption: Relating to applying an active efforts standard for the removal of certain children in the managing conservatorship of the Department of Family and Protective Services.
summary: This bill changes "reasonable efforts" to "active efforts" in Texas Family Code regarding child protection services. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all children under Texas DFPS care by requiring more proactive and thorough efforts to maintain/reunite families before removing children or terminating parental rights. The change requires more intensive family preservation services.
translation: 该法案将德克萨斯州家庭法典中关于儿童保护服务的"合理努力"改为"积极努力"。虽然并非专门针对中国移民，但它通过要求在移除儿童或终止父母权利之前采取更积极和全面的措施来维持/重聚家庭，从而影响到所有受德克萨斯州家庭保护服务部门照管的儿童。这一变化要求提供更密集的家庭保护服务。
